00024 /*! \file CDFProbeInformation.h This file defines the CDFProbeInformation class.
00025  */

00029 
00030 #include "calvin_files/data/src/DataSet.h"
00031 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00032 //
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00036 {
00037 /*! Class that exposes the CDF probe information */
00038 class CDFProbeInformation
00039 {
00040 public:
00041         /*! Constructor */
00042         CDFProbeInformation();
00043 
00044         /*! Get the list index (atom number) of the probe */
00045         u_int32_t GetListIndex() const { return listIndex; }
00046         /*! Get the exon position of the probe (for reseq)*/
00047         int GetExpos() const { return indexPos; }
00048         /*! Get the x-coordinate of the probe */
00049         u_int16_t GetX() const { return xCoord; }
00050         /*! Get the y-coordinate of the probe */
00051         u_int16_t GetY() const { return yCoord; }
00052         /*! Get the base of the probe at the substitution position */
00053         int8_t GetPBase() const { return baseProbe; }
00054         /*! Get the base of the target at the interrogation position */
00055         int8_t GetTBase() const { return baseTarget; }
00056         /*! Get the probe length */
00057         u_int16_t GetProbeLength() const { return probeLength; }
00058         /*! Get the probe grouping */
00059         u_int16_t GetProbeGrouping() const { return probeGrouping; }
00060 
00061 protected:
00062         enum DataSetColumns { XCoordCol, YCoordCol, ListIndexCol, IndexPosCol, BaseProbeCol, BaseTargetCol, ProbeLenCol, ProbeGroupCol };
00063 
00064         /*!  */
00065         void CopyFromDataSet(DataSet* ds, int32_t row);
00066 
00067 protected:
00068         /*! x-coordinate of the probe, m_X in C++ */
00069         u_int16_t xCoord;
00070         /*! y-coordinate of the probe, m_Y in C++ */
00071         u_int16_t yCoord;
00072         /*! list index (atom number), m_ListIndex in C++ */
00073         u_int32_t listIndex;
00074         /*! exon position for reseq, m_Expos in C++ */
00075         u_int32_t indexPos;
00076         /*! Base of the probe at the substitution position, m_PBase in C++ */
00077         int8_t baseProbe;
00078         /*! Base of the probe at the interrogation position, m_TBase in C++  */
00079         int8_t baseTarget;
00080         /*! Probe length, m_ProbeLength in C++  */
00081         u_int16_t probeLength;
00082         /*! Probe grouping, m_ProbeGrouping in C++  */
00083         u_int16_t probeGrouping;
00084 
00085         friend class CDFProbeGroupInformation;
00086 };
00087 
00088 }
00089 #endif // _CDFProbeInformation_HEADER_
